    New Hero[edit]

    • New Intelligence Hero

    Grimstroke[edit]

    General Changes[edit]

    • Daily Bonus Hero changed from 2 Mangoes to 1
    • Added 2 trees near the cliff area below the Dire primary jungle shrine

    Heroes[edit]

    Abaddon[edit]

    • Mist Coil mana cost reduced from 50/60/70/80 to 50

    Ancient Apparition[edit]

    • Ice Vortex mana cost reduced from 80/90/100/110 to 65/80/95/110

    Bloodseeker[edit]

    • Level 25 Talent reduced from +20% Max Thirst and Damage to +18%
    • Thirst bonus rescaled from 16/24/32/40 to 7/18/29/40

    Broodmother[edit]

    • Spin Web movement speed reduced from 40/50/60/70% to 25/40/55/70%
    • Spin Web charge replenish rate increased from 40 to 45 seconds

    Centaur Warrunner[edit]

    • Base strength increased by 2

    Crystal Maiden[edit]

    • Crystal Nova mana cost increased from 100/120/140/160 to 130/140/150/160

    Drow Ranger[edit]

    • Base strength reduced by 1

    Enchantress[edit]

    • Nature's Attendants mana cost increased from 110/120/140/150 to 170/160/150/140

    Grimstroke[edit]

    2018/08/29 Update

    • Stroke of Fate
      • Reduced movement slow duration from 2➜1.5
      • Movement slow can now be dispelled
      • Reduced projectile vision radius from 240➜160
      • Reduced projectile’s endpoint vision radius from 300➜160 and duration from 3.34➜2
      • Fixed +600 range talent incorrectly updating the range preview
    • Phantom's Embrace
      • Reduced phantom unit's vision range from 400➜200
      • Changed latch duration from 4/4.5/5/5.5➜4/4/5/5
      • If the target dies, the phantom now flies back to caster to refresh the cooldown
      • Fixed a bug with +2 hits required talent only giving +1.3 hits (4 non-hero hits instead of 6)
    • Ink Swell
      • Reduced bonus movement speed from 28/32/36/40%➜18/22/26/30%
      • Damage and stun amounts now range from 0 to max, instead of from a base value to max
      • Ink tendril particle doesn't display if the affected enemy unit is invisible
    • Soulbind
      • No longer sees through invisibility on leashed targets

    2018/08/25 Update

    • New Hero

    Juggernaut[edit]

    • Blade Fury damage increased from 80/105/130/155 to 90/115/140/160

    Necrophos[edit]

    • Ghost Shroud self magic resistance reduction increased from 30% to 40%
    • Reaper's Scythe Scepter cooldown increased from 55/40/25 to 60/50/40
    • Reaper's Scythe cast point increased from 0.5 to 0.55

    Ogre Magi[edit]

    • Fireblast damage increased from 55/110/165/220 to 60/120/180/240

    Outworld Devourer[edit]

    • Sanity's Eclipse damage multiplier increased from 8/9/10 to 9/10/11
    • Essence Aura mana bonus increased from 125/200/275/350 to 150/250/350/450

    Phantom Lancer[edit]

    • Juxtapose Illusion incoming damage increased from 500% to 600%
    • Base intelligence reduced by 2

    Phoenix[edit]

    • Level 15 Talent reduced from +60 Fire Spirits DPS to +50

    Puck[edit]

    • Waning Rift silence duration increased from 1.5/2/2.5/3 to 2/2.5/3/3.5

    Pudge[edit]

    • Meat Hook cooldown increased from 17/15/13/11 to 27/22/17/12

    Pugna[edit]

    • Base damage reduced by 2

    Riki[edit]

    • Smoke Screen cast point improved from 0.4 to 0.2

    Shadow Shaman[edit]

    • Base armor increased by 1

    Sniper[edit]

    • Level 15 Talent increased from +25 Shrapnel DPS to +35

    Sven[edit]

    • Base damage increased by 2

    Templar Assassin[edit]

    • Psionic Trap damage reduced from 250/350/450 to 250/300/350

    Timbersaw[edit]

    • Reactive Armor armor per stack increased from 1/1.2/1.4/1.6 to 1.3/1.4/1.5/1.6

    Treant Protector[edit]

    • Leech Seed mana cost increased from 80/95/110/125 to 100/110/120/130

    Visage[edit]

    • Gravekeeper's Cloak minimum damage reduced from 50 to 40

    Weaver[edit]

    • Base movement speed reduced from 280 to 275

    Windranger[edit]

    • Windrun cooldown﻿ increased from 12 to 15/14/13/12﻿

    Winter Wyvern[edit]

    • Splinter Blast mana cost increased from 90/110/130/150 to 105/120/135/150

    Zeus[edit]

    • Nimbus radius reduced from 500 to 450
